author: andschwa
body: Like HOSTNAME to COMPUTERNAME and USER to USERNAME for script compatibility.  Mapped variables that could be mapped  TMP, USER, HOSTNAME, HOMEPATH .   PRed and merged.  VSO create date - 11/1/2015 20:54:00     VSO closed date - 12/7/2015 10:33:00
title: Support mapping of 1-1 mapped environment variables
